topComments.author: Chris McCoy
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s passamos por 4 filas para conseguir comida (n√≥s cheg√°vamos no meio de uma fila apenas para saber que eles estavam sem hamb√∫rgueres, frango, batatas fritas, etc.). Quando chegamos ao caixa para fazer o pedido na quarta linha, eles estavam sem frango e batatas fritas. A corrida de julho de 2021 teve apenas um trailer de vendedor de scanner e foi no final do trecho frontal mais distante das entradas. Presumimos que o (s) trailer (s) do scanner estariam perto das entradas / sa√≠das. Voc√™ praticamente tem que sair mais cedo para deixar os scanners no final, a fim de evitar ter que lutar contra a multid√£o que sai enquanto voc√™ vai na dire√ß√£o oposta para deixar os scanners e, em seguida, ficar atr√°s de todos que voc√™ acabou de passar que estavam indo para o sa√≠das. A a√ß√£o na pista foi boa, no entanto.  (Original) We went through 4 lines to get food (we'd get half way through a line only to be told that they were all out of burgers, chicken, fries, etc.). By the time we got up to the register to order in the fourth line, they were out of chicken tenders and fries. The July 2021 race only had one scanner vendor trailer and it was at the end of the front stretch furthest away from the entrances. We assumed that the scanner trailer(s) would be near the entrances/exits. You pretty much have to leave early to drop off the scanners at the end in order to avoid having to fight the crowd exiting as you go the opposite direction to drop off the scanners and then get behind everyone that you just passed that were going to the exits. The action on the track was good, though.
